attributes.title: Garbage app.
attributes.review: The app gave me very bad virus’s on my phone, and made it super laggy. I feel this app needs to be taken down for a reason. Not only did it give me terrible virus’s, it also kept spamming my email with unwanted garbage mail. Please apple if you have any sense take this horrid app down. It’ll help so many people and save their soft and hard wares.

attributes.title: hacked
attributes.review: the worst app. my information was used and i was then hacked on ALL my info, my contacts, apps, my mom got calls non stop including my other friends. the worst app, i also got things delivered to my house that we’re scary. people found out i downloaded the app and now i get death threats because my information was leaked. DONT USE THE APP ITS THE WORST

attributes.title: ugh
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever like i can’t even believe it exists. it took wayyy too long to download and it made my phone lag so much. DO NOT download this app if you want your phone to glitch and run very slowly. it tracked my location even though i did not give it permission. it used up so much of my data. i’m very unimpressed.

attributes.title: Gave my phone a virus
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it gave my phone a virus. I couldn’t use anything and all my data was deleted so I had to get a new phone. Even some data that was backed up into the cloud. Very poor quality! How can we expect him to run a country right if he can’t run an app right? Very disappointed!!

attributes.title: Caused me to go blind-
attributes.review: Well uhh I was downloading the app it took about 3 days sadly, when it finally downloaded I went blind from so much orange I was seeing😞! Oh btw trump what blush you be using I need some🙂. Well back to my story 😞, I went blind cause I saw so much orange and it made my eyes hurt from me scrolling so much😞! But otherwise WTH IS AMERICA WITHOUT TIKTOK YOU ORANGE TOMATO!!🙂! AnYwAyS 😞, yea so now I need glasses 😞!! It’s a very bad blinding!

attributes.title: EXECUTE YOURSELF DONALD!
attributes.review:
This app is so bad! Like when I first opened the app I literally almost had a seizure... yes a seizure! Wanna know what I seen? I’ll tel you what I seen! I seen a orange! A freaking wrinkled saggy orange! 

Not only this opening this app made my phone glitch hard like hard hard. And it also made my feet smell a little I’m funky.

I’m just saying this app needs to get deported over the “wall!”

attributes.title: Oh god
attributes.review: This app is absolutely pointless! I was so in support of Trump before but then I learned just how miserable he and his views are! I don’t know if it’s the lack of information this app provided or the fact that I’m now being awakened to how much of a racist bigot he is but Mr. Donald Trump may you never win a seat in the office ever again. Trump does not have my vote anymore. Trump2020 OUT!

attributes.title: You can’t get rid of us 😼🙈😍🧚
attributes.review: this is one of the WORST apps I have ever downloaded in my life . Let me start off with the glitches oh my god, who created this app ? Someone not really smart. For anybody who wants to download this app let me just tell you something it’s a absolute 0/10, waste of your time, and just such a horrible app . Rate it 1 star yall😁❤️

attributes.title: Couldn’t be any worse.
attributes.review: This app is honestly the biggest waste of data and storage anyone could invest in. Like truly I don’t understand who made this, but fire them immediately and make sure they don’t work again. This app is so useless and I can’t believe the so called “president” would allow for this... no.

attributes.title: Very bad😾🤬😡👺👹
attributes.review: very bad app😾 it caused a big virus on my phone and it changed my wallpaper from “Kim Namjoon For President 2020” to “trump for president 2020”🤬👁👄👁🍊🖕 Also my bunny started saying “Trump 2020” so cooked him and he was very yummy👁👅👁 and then my dead hamster came back to life and started writing “Trump 2020” on my wall so i cooked him also😚 Very bad app, do not recommend unless you want a virus on your phone👹😾😡
